hero.title: Rent outdoor gear in just a minute
hero.subtitle: Get the right equipment for your trip without phone calls or waiting. Every step from booking to return is planned for you.

securePayments.title: Secure payment
securePayments.description: We hold the deposit in escrow until the gear is returned.

availability.title: Live availability
availability.description: Check real-time calendars instead of calling rental shops.

support.title: Support along the way
support.description: We remind you about pickup and return and help if anything changes.
support.iconLabel: Confetti icon showing a smooth experience

steps.sectionTitle: Step by step from booking to return
steps.sectionSubtitle: The whole process takes a minute and you can manage everything from your Kitloop profile.

discover.title: Choose your gear
discover.description: Filter by location, date or activity to see what is truly available.
discover.tip: Use filters and save favourites to compare options quickly.
discover.iconLabel: Magnifying glass icon representing gear search

book.title: Confirm the dates
book.description: A few clicks secure the booking, we keep the deposit safe and send confirmations by email.
book.tip: Add a note for the provider so they know the exact plan.

pickup.title: Pick up on site
pickup.description: Your in-app QR code acts as the handover protocol so everyone sees the status and time.
pickup.tip: Open the QR code in advance to keep the handover quick.

return.title: Return without stress
return.description: Confirm the return in the app, the deposit is released and you can leave a review immediately.
return.tip: Share a short review to help other renters and the provider.
return.iconLabel: Confetti icon symbolising a successful return

behind.title: What happens behind the scenes
behind.subtitle: We manage every reservation from confirmation to return so you can stay relaxed.

notify.title: Instant notification
notify.description: Providers receive the full overview as soon as you book so they can prepare.

tracking.title: Timeline tracking
tracking.description: We monitor start and end times and send reminders if anything runs late.

help.title: Team on call
help.description: The Kitloop team is ready to jump in and help coordinate the next steps.

pilot.title: Join from day one
pilot.description: Kitloop is running a pilot with selected rental partners to digitise bookings in days, not months.

onboarding.title: Personal onboarding
onboarding.description: We set up your profile, pricing and inventory together so everything is ready.

communication.title: Fast communication

feedback.title: Product shaped by you
feedback.description: Your feedback goes straight to the product team and we ship improvements every week.
